item.title: 亚历克斯-琼斯下属公司质疑洋葱公司收购 Infowars
item.description: 与阴谋论者亚历克斯-琼斯（Alex Jones）有关的一个竞标失败者周一对洋葱（Onion）收购琼斯的 Infowars 网站一事提出质疑，称洋葱赢得了一场被操纵的破产拍卖，并提供了比其出价少一半的现金。【原文：A losing bidder connected to conspiracy theorist Alex Jones challenged on Monday the Onion's purchase of Jones' Infowars website, saying the Onion won a rigged bankruptcy auction and offered half as much cash as its bid.】

item.title: Stellantis 首席执行官表示将适应特朗普执政下的美国市场
item.description: Stellantis 公司首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）周一表示，Stellantis 公司将适应特朗普政府执政后美国汽车市场的预期变化，该公司的平台可提供电动、混合动力或汽油版车型。【原文：Stellantis' will adapt to changes in the U.S. car market expected under a Trump government, CEO Carlos Tavares said on Monday, with a platform that can offer electric, hybrid or gasoline versions of its models.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将标准普尔 500 指数 2025 年年末的基本目标上调至 6500 点
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）股票策略师迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）和其他策略师在周一的一份报告中写道，摩根士丹利已将 S&P 500 指数的 12 个月基本目标价上调至 6500 点。【原文：Morgan Stanley has increased its 12-month base case price target on the S&P 500 to 6,500, the firm's equity strategist Michael Wilson and other strategists wrote in a note on Monday.】

item.title: 旧金山联储经济学家：美国劳动力市场仍在推动通胀
item.description: 根据旧金山联储周一发表的研究报告，美国劳动力市场的紧张状况仍在增加通胀压力，不过与2022年和2023年相比，压力有所减轻。【原文：A tight U.S. labor market is still adding to inflationary pressures, though less so than it did in 2022 and 2023, according to research published on Monday by the San Francisco Federal Reserve.】

item.title: FCA 称前巴克莱首席执行官斯塔利在调查期间就与爱泼斯坦的接触问题误导了它
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（FCA）的律师周一指控称，巴克莱银行前首席执行官杰斯-斯塔利（Jes Staley）在英国金融行为监管局调查他与杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）的关系时，对他与爱泼斯坦的交易作了误导性的回答。【原文：Ex-Barclays CEO Jes Staley gave misleading answers to Britain's Financial Conduct Authority about his dealings with Jeffrey Epstein when it was investigating his relationship with the disgraced financier, the FCA's lawyers alleged on Monday.】

item.title: WARN通知显示波音将在华盛顿州裁员近2200人
item.description: 周一的一份《工人调整和再培训通知》（WARN）显示，波音公司正在华盛顿州裁员近 2200 人。【原文：Boeing is laying off nearly 2,200 workers in Washington State, a Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification (WARN) showed on Monday.】

item.title: 超低成本航空公司精神航空申请破产
item.description: 在经历了长期的季度亏损、失败的兼并尝试和即将到期的债务后，廉价航空先驱精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）于周一申请破产保护。【原文：No-frills air travel pioneer Spirit Airlines filed for bankruptcy protection on Monday, after struggling with a long run of quarterly losses, failed merger attempt and upcoming debt maturities.】

item.title: Kering 任命塞德里克-沙比特为圣罗兰首席执行官
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering）周一表示，已任命塞德里克-沙比特（Cedric Charbit）为时尚品牌圣罗兰（Saint Laurent）的首席执行官，从集团内部为其第二大时尚品牌选择了一位领导者。【原文：French luxury group Kering said on Monday it had named Cedric Charbit as CEO of fashion house Saint Laurent, choosing a leader for its second largest fashion label from within its ranks.】

item.title: 依云生产商达能打败 "碳中和 "诉讼
item.description: 依云矿泉水生产商达能公司驳回了对其瓶子上的 "碳中和 "说法提出质疑的诉讼，因为一名美国法官推翻了其先前的裁决，允许拟议的集体诉讼继续进行。【原文：The maker of Evian spring water, Danone , won the dismissal of a lawsuit challenging its "carbon neutral" claim on bottles, as a U.S. judge reversed his earlier ruling letting the proposed class action proceed.】

item.title: 印度竞争监管机构因 WhatsApp 的 2021 年隐私政策对 Meta 罚款 2540 万美元
item.description: 印度竞争监督机构周一对 Meta 公司处以 21.4 亿卢比（约合 2540 万美元）的罚款，原因是 WhatsApp 的 2021 年隐私政策违反了反垄断法。【原文：India's competition watchdog imposed a monetary penalty of 2.14 billion rupees ($25.4 million) on Meta on Monday over antitrust violations related to WhatsApp's 2021 privacy policy.】

item.title: 调查显示 11 月美国住宅建筑商信心创 7 个月新高
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，美国共和党在大选中大获全胜，激发了人们对监管改革的乐观情绪，而监管改革可能会带来更多的住宅建设，因此，11月份美国住宅建筑商的情绪升至七个月来的最高点，对未来六个月销售的预期也飙升至约两年半以来的最高点。【原文：U.S. homebuilder sentiment rose to a seven-month high in November and expectations for sales in the next six months surged to the highest in about two-and-a-half years after a Republican election sweep fueled optimism for regulatory changes that could lead to more residential construction, a survey said on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西开发银行与亚洲国际投资银行签署近 30 亿美元投资协议
item.description: 巴西开发银行（BNDES）周一表示，已与亚洲基础设施投资银行（AIIB）签署协议，将向拉美最大经济体投资 167 亿雷亚尔（28.9 亿美元）。【原文：Brazilian development bank BNDES said on Monday that it has signed a deal with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) for the investment of 16.7 billion reais ($2.89 billion) in Latin America's largest economy.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，高盛计划分拆数字资产平台
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，高盛正在与潜在合作伙伴洽谈，计划将其数字资产平台分拆成一家新公司，供大型金融公司通过区块链技术创建、交易和结算金融工具。【原文：Goldman Sachs is speaking with potential partners as it plans to spin out its digital-assets platform into a new company for large financial firms to create, trade and settle financial instruments via blockchain technology, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟将与 NBA 的媒体合作关系延长 11 年
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司周一表示，已与美国国家篮球协会达成协议，将双方的媒体合作关系再延长 11 年，并已解决了与 NBA 近期媒体协议有关的所有争议。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery said on Monday it had reached a deal with the National Basketball Association to extend their media partnership for an additional 11 years and that it had resolved all disputes related to NBA's recent media agreements.】

item.title: 德国法院称，受数据泄露事件影响的 Facebook 用户有资格获得赔偿
item.description: 德国一家法院周一表示，2018 年和 2019 年数据被非法获取的 Facebook 用户有资格获得赔偿。【原文：A German court said on Monday that Facebook users whose data was illegally obtained in 2018 and 2019 were eligible for compensation.】

item.title: 特斯拉因特朗普团队计划制定联邦自动驾驶汽车法规的报道而上涨
item.description: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的过渡团队计划为自动驾驶汽车制定联邦法规，特斯拉股价在周一盘前上涨近 7%。【原文：Tesla shares rose nearly 7% in trading before the bell on Monday after Bloomberg News reported that President-elect Donald Trump's transition team was planning to set up federal regulations for autonomous vehicles.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司签署谅解备忘录，扩大与印度尼西亚 PTDI 的合作
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周日晚些时候表示，该公司已与印度尼西亚PT Dirgantara Indonesia公司（PTDI）签署了一份谅解备忘录（MoU），以扩大双方在商业航空领域的合作。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer said late on Sunday that it had signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with Indonesia's PT Dirgantara Indonesia (PTDI) to expand their collaboration in commercial aviation.】

item.title: 沃尔玛利润大增，股价将创 1999 年以来最佳表现
item.description: 沃尔玛的股价将创下二十多年来的最佳年度涨幅，因为这家零售巨头的日常必需品价格低廉，使其在面对预算意识较强的消费者需求疲软的竞争对手时更具优势。【原文：Walmart shares are set for their best yearly gains in over two decades as the retail behemoth's low prices for everyday essentials give it an edge over competitors facing weak demand from budget-conscious consumers.】

item.title: 俄罗斯法院对 Alphabet 旗下谷歌的违规行为处以 3.8 万美元罚款
item.description: 俄罗斯地区法院周一对 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司处以 380 万卢布（38057 美元）的罚款，原因是该公司未能删除违禁内容。【原文：A Russian district court fined Alphabet's Google 3.8 million roubles ($38,057) on Monday for failing to remove banned content.】

item.title: 美国就安全带问题对超过 11 万辆福特 SUV 展开调查
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周一表示，已就安全带卷收器问题对约112,567辆福特SUV启动召回调查。【原文：The U.S. auto safety regulator said on Monday it had initiated a recall query into about 112,567 Ford SUVs over an issue with seat belt retractors.】

item.title: CVS 在与 Glenview Capital 的交易中新增四名董事会成员
item.description: CVS Health 周一表示，根据与 Glenview Capital Management 达成的协议，公司董事会将新增四名成员，其中包括该对冲基金的首席执行官拉里-罗宾斯（Larry Robbins）。【原文：CVS Health said on Monday it would add four new members to its board in an agreement with Glenview Capital Management, including the hedge fund's chief executive Larry Robbins.】

item.title: 早间竞价：伤痕累累的华尔街对英伟达保持警惕
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 前一周下跌后，期货价格涨跌互现，市场焦点重新回到盈利上
item.description: 周一，美国股票期货涨跌不一，投资者在等待关键企业的业绩，尤其是英伟达（Nvidia）的业绩，此前一周华尔街股市大幅下跌。【原文：U.S. stock futures were mixed on Monday, as investors awaited key corporate results, particularly from Nvidia, following significant declines on Wall Street the previous week.】

item.title: 销售增长放缓，英伟达黑科技收入成焦点
item.description: 在过去的八个季度里，英伟达（Nvidia）的营收都超过了华尔街的预期。但由于分析师预计增长速度将放缓，该公司如何克服延迟和供应链问题来销售其最新的人工智能芯片，很可能成为其股价的晴雨表。【原文：Nvidia has bested lofty Wall Street revenue expectations for the past eight quarters. But as analysts expect a slower pace of growth, how the company overcomes delays and supply chain issues to sell its latest AI chips is likely to be a barometer for its stock price.】

item.title: 医疗补助助推诺和诺德、礼来减肥药在美国上市
item.description: 据路透社共享的一份分析报告显示，美国政府的医疗保险计划为流行的减肥新药提供了大部分保险，远远超出了私人雇主和保险公司的报销范围。【原文：U.S. government health plans account for the lion's share of coverage for popular new weight-loss drugs, far beyond the reimbursement available from private employers and insurers, according to an analysis shared with Reuters.】

item.title: 阿根廷投资者在米莱伊当选一年后将赌注押在他的受欢迎程度上
item.description: 投资者因押注阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊而获得回报，他们正加倍押注该国的股票和债券，即使这些股票和债券创下历史纪录，他们押注紧缩政策将带来更多红利。【原文：Investors who have been rewarded for their bets on Argentine President Javier Milei are doubling down on the country's stocks and bonds even as they hit records, betting that an austerity crusade will pay further dividends.】

item.title: 精神航空公司申请破产
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周一披露，该公司已申请破产保护，在此之前，这家美国免票旅行先驱一直在季度亏损和巨额债务中挣扎。【原文：Spirit Airlines has filed for bankruptcy protection after the pioneer of no-frills travel in the U.S. struggled with a long run of quarterly losses and significant debt, it disclosed on Monday.】

item.title: 野村预计美联储将在 12 月暂停降息周期
item.description: 野村证券（Nomura）表示，预计美国联邦储备委员会将不再在 12 月的政策会议上降息，这也是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选后首家发出暂停央行降息周期信号的全球券商。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve is no longer expected to cut interest rates at its December policy meeting, Nomura has said, making it the first global brokerage to signal a pause in the central bank's rate-cutting cycle in the wake of Donald Trump's election win.】

item.title: 小米首席执行官：SU7 交付量突破 10 万台，年底目标 13 万台
item.description: 小米公司首席执行官雷军周一表示，其旗舰电动汽车系列 SU7 的交付量已突破 10 万辆。【原文：Xiaomi CEO Lei Jun said on Monday that deliveries of its flagship electric vehicle series SU7 has surpassed 100,000 units.】

item.title: 独家报道：受危机影响的电动汽车电池冠军 Northvolt 努力实现生产目标
item.description: 据公司内部文件和公司消息来源称，陷入困境的绿色科技公司 Northvolt 已错过了一些内部目标，并已削减了其位于瑞典北部的电池电池厂的产量，这凸显了提高产量所面临的挑战。【原文：Embattled green tech player Northvolt has missed some in-house targets and has curtailed production at its battery cells plant in northern Sweden, according to internal company documents and company sources, underscoring the challenge of ramping up output.】
